TextView.android:text: We understand the importance of an internship as they are a proven way to gain relevant knowledge, skills, and experience while establishing important connections in the field. Recognizing this , we wish to conduct an internship mela in our college . During this process, we want to ensure that both the employer and the students willing to do an internship are benefitted, by the exchange of ideas. For this, we plan to invite startups from across the country, so that this acts as both an exchange platform for the entrepreneurs to share and explore ideas, while providing a base for the students to gain an internship.
